channel.title: Docs on Sakuli E2E Testing and Monitoring

item.title: Getting started
item.description: Prerequisites Sakuli is built and tested against the current LTS version of Node.js. In order to be able to run Sakuli on your system, we will assume that you have a Node v10.15.3 (lts/dubnium) installed on it. To install Node on your system, you can either go to the Node website or you can use tools like Node Version Manager, a utility to manage various Node versions on a per-user basis.
